verbs.description: A Tennessee woman [V: is] demanding answers from President Donald Trump for staying tight - lipped about the Waffle House shooting in Antioch on Sunday .
[ARG0: A Tennessee woman] is [V: demanding] [ARG1: answers from President Donald Trump for staying tight - lipped about the Waffle House shooting in Antioch on Sunday] .
